answers.answer: I feel like I'm always hungry. This is the most I've eaten. But I'm taking advantage of always being hungry, I need to gain weight. Stay strong!
Ikr i can eat non stop nd not feel full.....im tryn nt to b to greedy....lol

I was like that with my last pregnancy I had gd with him thankfully this pregnancy I'm clear of it. I would be starving in the mornings but one thing I learned was try eating some yougurt and string cheese at night for a snack or something that has good protein but isn't heavy.My lunch I would eat salads or lettuce wraps dry eat a hamburger no bun I know its hard but its best for your lil one. I do have to say indulge yourself everyone now and then I'm sure it wouldn't hurt

I am in the same boat as you and I am not sure if I have gd or not they won't tell me if I do or not they said I am on the fence I still have to test my self but yes very hard cause I am always hungry as well. Any suggestions to help I'll take it ;)

I wake up starving too lol...so glad to hear its not just me and its not the GD thats making me feel this way! My doc just told me about the protein snack at night too..i will try that! We are almost there mamas! =-)
I'll be 31wks Saturday and I get full easily, I feel like I eat too much when I really don't

I'm 33 weeks and I learn througjout my pregnancy when I'm starving and on a food rampage not to go all out. I'm 200 pounds now:( I was 156 when I became pregnant. Its not easy to lose this weight either

question: At 32 weeks I am having such a hard time getting full nowadays and it doesnt help that I am on a strict diet because of G Diabetes...any of u ladies going thru the same thing?
title: Never Full Anymore
